Changelog
=========

Tecnoteca Google Map 1.2 - November 11, 2013
	- getRelatedItems bug fix

Tecnoteca Google Map 1.1 - October 8, 2013
    - GoogleMaps API v3
    - Georeference custom ContentTypes
    - French translation (thanks Andr√© Nuyens)
	- Traffic, Bicycle, Weather, Street view buttons
	- Full width option

Tecnoteca Google Map 1.0 - August 4, 2010
	- Markers and categories boxes with customizable max-height
	- Improved markers list (added categories titles)
	- Coord widget bug fix (marker drag)

Tecnoteca Google Map 1.0-b2 - May 14, 2010
    - Portlet bug fix

Tecnoteca Google Map 1.0-b1 - March 16, 2010
    - Initial public release.
